vlive.korean: 또한, 제모 크림 또는 포밍 제품을 사용하면 피부를 베는 경우를 방지해줘요. And another reason why it is important to use a shaving cream or foam it is because it allows you to prevent cutting your skin. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Hair Removal 101 | Make Your Own DIY Shaving Cream & Shaving Foam
vlive.english: And another reason why it is important to use a shaving cream or foam it is because it allows you to prevent cutting your skin.

vlive.korean: 실제로 베는 것 같아요 실제로. - 22초 남았고요. It seems like he's really slicing them. - There are 22 seconds left. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]VAV X VSLIVE - VAV의 VSLIVE!

vlive.korean: 이렇게 다리 사이에 하나, 몸통에 하나, 그다음에 베는 거 하나. I need one between my legs, one by my body, and one for my head. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [REPLAY]CNBLUE's LieV - CNBLUE의 눕방 라이브!
